title: Japan Centrally-Located Takayama Hideaway with Traditional Restaurant & Rooftop Onsen
description:
Nestled in an enchanting Japanese mountain town, this property artfully weaves French sophistication with traditional craftsmanship. Hobar Restaurant & Bar highlights the region's celebrated Hida artistry and Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, while the therapeutic waters of indoor and outdoor onsen await guests on the top floor.

Step outside to experience centuries of Japanese history unfold along preserved Edo-period streets. Mercure Hida Takayama puts you moments from Takayama morning market, one of the biggest in Japan. Explore the historic sake breweries in the Sanmachi-suji district, or take a short journey to the UNESCO World Heritage site of Shirakawa-go.
